text: 5% Hemiplegia/hemiparesis 7.5% Hemoptysis 7.5% Intestinal obstruction 7.5% Malabsorption 7.5% Myalgia 7.5% Myositis 7.5% Nasal polyposis 7.5% Proteinuria 7.5% Pulmonary embolism 7.5% Renal insufficiency 7.5% Respiratory insufficiency 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
